entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
